** 25 則陽第二十五

則陽遊於楚，¶	KR2c0021_112:97b:6:3:2,KR5c0126_025:1a:1:1:0,KR5c0127_080:001a:4:1:2,KR5c0128_026:001a:4:1:2,KR5c0135_024:001a:6:1:3,KR5c0136_014:001a:7:1:2,KR5h0057_006:035a:7:1:37,KR5i0036_004:04p095a:5:1:22,KR6q0219_003:0048a:15:1:149

曰：¶

夫夷節之為人也，¶	KR2c0021_112:98a:2:9:2,KR5c0126_025:1a:19:1:4,KR5c0138_008:30b:3:25:3
无德而有知，¶	KR5c0126_025:1a:20:1:4
不自許，¶
以之神其交	KR2c0021_112:98a:3:3:2,KR5c0051_008:43b:1:17:6,KR5c0126_025:1a:22:1:4,KR5c0127_080:001a:10:4:2,KR5c0128_026:001a:10:4:2,KR5c0135_024:001b:3:15:4,KR5c0135_024:002a:4:4:4,KR5c0136_014:001b:3:4:3,KR5c0138_008:30b:4:15:3,KR5c0139_027:002b:1:15:5,KR5h0057_006:035b:3:6:38,KR5i0036_004:04p095a:10:12:22,KR6q0219_003:0048a:16:11:150
固，¶顛冥乎富貴之地，¶	KR5c0051_008:43b:2:5:6,KR5c0126_025:1a:22:6:4,KR5h0057_006:035b:3:11:38
非相助以德，¶	KR2c0021_112:98a:3:16:2,KR5c0051_008:43b:4:1:6,KR5c0126_025:1a:24:1:4,KR5c0127_080:001a:10:17:2,KR5c0128_026:001a:10:17:2,KR5c0128_026:002a:7:15:2,KR5c0135_024:001b:4:12:4,KR5c0136_014:001b:3:17:3,KR5c0138_008:30b:6:33:3,KR5c0139_027:002b:10:1:5,KR5h0057_006:035b:4:2:38,KR5i0036_004:04p095b:1:5:22

夫凍者假兼衣於春，¶	KR5c0126_025:1a:26:1:4

故聖人，¶
其窮也

其達也

而化卑。¶

犀首聞而恥之，曰：¶	KR2c0021_109:19a:8:2:1,KR4c0022_018:9b:3:7:7,KR5c0051_008:47a:5:1:6,KR5c0126_025:1a:112:1:15,KR5c0127_081:009a:9:4:37,KR5c0128_026:008b:4:4:2,KR5c0136_014:005b:2:4:7,KR5i0036_004:04p097b:5:21:22
「君為萬乘之君也，¶	KR2d0023_047:3a:8:7:2,KR5c0126_025:1a:113:1:15
而以匹夫從讎！¶	KR2c0021_109:19a:8:16:1,KR2d0023_047:3a:8:14:2,KR4c0022_018:9b:3:21:7,KR5c0051_008:47a:5:15:6,KR5c0126_025:1a:114:1:15,KR5c0127_081:009a:9:17:37,KR5c0128_026:008b:5:1:2,KR5c0135_024:005b:2:1:8,KR5c0136_014:005b:3:1:7,KR5c0138_008:33b:7:4:3,KR5c0139_027:015a:1:15:17,KR5h0057_006:039b:7:2:42,KR5i0036_004:04p097b:6:15:22

# dating: 8110
客出而君惝然	KR2c0021_109:20a:6:16:1,KR2d0023_047:4a:7:17:2,KR3j0060_001:8a:7:11:3,KR4c0022_018:9b:8:16:7,KR4e0171_053:6a:6:7:8,KR5c0126_025:1a:176:1:29,KR5c0127_081:010a:6:16:37,KR5c0128_026:009b:10:9:2,KR5c0135_024:006a:9:6:8,KR5c0136_014:006a:10:7:7,KR5c0139_027:019b:7:1:22,KR5h0057_006:040b:4:8:43,KR5i0036_004:04p098b:5:14:22

召己也，¶

以得為在民，¶	KR1d0057_139:19b:8:14:0,KR1d0057_142:19b:1:9:0,KR2b0017_074:20b:5:8:1,KR2c0021_083:39b:7:6:1,KR5c0126_025:10a:61:1:46,KR5c0138_008:37b:1:20:3
以失為在己；¶	KR1d0057_139:19b:8:19:0,KR1h0012_010:14b:8:20:47,KR2b0017_074:20b:5:13:1,KR5c0126_025:10a:62:1:46
以正為在民，¶	KR2b0017_074:20b:5:18:1,KR2c0021_083:39b:7:16:1,KR5c0126_025:10a:63:1:46,KR5c0138_008:37b:2:12:3
以枉為在己；¶	KR5c0126_025:10a:64:1:46
故一物有失其形者，¶	KR5a0164_000:010a:2:6:0,KR5c0126_025:10a:65:1:46,KR5c0178_001:005b:10:6:2

# dating: 8110
此名實之可紀，¶	KR2c0021_112:101a:4:12:2,KR5c0051_008:58b:1:61:6,KR5c0126_025:10a:193:1:67,KR5c0127_084:001a:8:3:2,KR5c0127_084:003b:5:11:2,KR5c0128_026:020a:7:3:2,KR5c0135_024:011b:5:3:14,KR5c0136_014:013a:8:3:14,KR5c0138_008:41a:5:3:3,KR5c0139_027:042b:4:1:45,KR5h0057_006:048a:4:3:50,KR5i0036_004:04p103a:6:12:22

或之使，¶
